name: THORVALLA an RPG by Guido Henkel (Canceled)
blurb: Guido Henkel, producer of Planescape: Torment, is ready to bring you a re-imagined approach to fantasy computer RPGs

rewards.reward: No Reward

EARLY BIRD EDITION\u2014This reward is available only to the first backers of THORVALLA. You will receive a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD copy of the game, as well as access to the THORVALLA forums where you can contribute to the game\u2019s development and share your thoughts.

You will receive a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD copy of the game, as well as an exclusive IN-GAME ITEM that is unique to Kickstarter backers. In addition, you will get access to the THORVALLA forums where you can contribute to the game\u2019s development and share your thoughts.

DUNGEON CRAWLER\u2014Along with all previous tier rewards, backers at this level will find the "Temple of the Founders," an extensive BONUS DUNGEON to be part of their game. Test your mettle against some truly dark creatures in an attempt to raise a curse. Collect additional gold, experience and special reputation points for your characters in this dungeon!
Previous tier reward, plus a DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK copy of the game\u2019s music.

Previous tier reward, plus your NAME IN THE CONTRIBUTOR LIST list in the game, along with an EXCLUSIVE BADGE in your forum profile and a DIGITAL ART BOOK with illustrations from the game as a PDF file or an actual eBook.

Previous tier reward, plus an eBook version of an exclusive THORVALLA NOVEL by best-selling author Steven Savile. This is a book that will be available only to backers of this campaign and and will not be sold outside of our funding campaign.
Previous tier reward, plus a DIGITAL STRATEGY GUIDE. This is the perfect package for international backers, as it involves no shipping costs or taxes.
Previous tier reward, plus a BOXED COPY OF THE GAME. This will be a production-run version of the game, as it is sold in stores.

Previous tier reward, but instead of a production-run copy, this will give you a LIMITED EDITION BOXED COPY OF THE GAME, available only to Kickstarter backers. This boxed copy features a unique cover artwork and will include the game CD/DVD, soundtrack CD, a printed manual, a map, and additional materials. Starting with this reward tier you will also get access to an early beta of the game.
Previous reward tier, plus a printed copy of the THORVALLA STRATEGY GUIDE.
Previous tier reward, plus an exclusive THORVALLA MOUSEPAD, limited to Kickstarter backers. The mousepad features an exclusive image that will not be sold anywhere else.

Previous tier reward, plus an exclusive an exclusive THORVALLA NOVEL by best-selling author Steven Savile. This is a book that will be available only to backers of this campaign and and will not be sold outside of our funding campaign.
$200 tier reward, plus a Logitech\u00ae G600 gaming mouse at no additional shipping cost to you. This is a limited quantity reward and will not propagate to higher rewards levels. (US backers only!)

$200 tier reward, plus a Logitech\u00ae G600 gaming mouse at no additional shipping cost to you. This is a limited quantity reward and will not propagate to higher rewards levels. (IMPORTANT: This is just for EU backers (Denmark, Belguim, Germany, Spain, France, Ireland, Italy, Hungary, The Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Switzerland, Finland, Sweden, UK, Austria.)
Previous tier reward, plus a THORVALLA T-SHIRT. Limited to Kickstarter backers, this exclusive t-shirt will feature a unique design that will not be sold anywhere else.
Previous tier reward, plus your limited edition boxed copy of the game will be SIGNED BY GUIDO HENKEL and other members of the development team.

Previous tier reward, plus an exclusive numbered and SIGNED SENIGRAPH of the game\u2019s exclusive cover. This senigraph is strictly limited to Kickstarter backers and will not be available anywhere else.
Previous reward tier, plus a printed copy of the THORVALLA ART BOOK.

Previous tier reward, plus you get to NAME AND DESIGN AN NPC CHARACTER in the game. We will create a character based on your design in the shipped game. (Certain limitations will apply, of course.)\r\nIn addition you will receive five (5) Digital Copies of the game, instead of only one\u2014enough to give away to your friends.

Previous tier reward, plus you get to NAME AND DESIGN A MONSTER in the game. We will create a monster based on your design in the shipped game. Unlike the NPCs, players will encounter these monsters over and over again throughout the game. (Certain limitations will apply, of course.)\r\nIn addition you will receive five (5) Digital Copies of the game, instead of only one\u2014enough to give away to your friends.

BE IN THE GAME\u2014Along with all previous tier rewards, we will also put you in the game. Based on a photo from you, we will craft a monument in your image and insert it in the game for the whole world to see.\r\nIn addition you will receive ten (10) Digital Copies of the game, instead of only one\u2014enough to give away to your friends.

The ULTIMATE BACKER PACKAGE\u2014Along with all the previous tier rewards, you will have the unique opportunity to join us for the LAUNCH PARTY of the game. We will host you and put you up in a fancy hotel and give you the chance to hang with us to celebrate the completion of THORVALLA. (You will have to pay for your own travel expenses, however.)\r\nIn addition you will receive ten (10) Digital Copies of the game, instead of only one\u2014enough to give away to your friends.
